message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on the task of image captioning, which involves generating natural language descriptions of visual content. This task is at the intersection of computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed method involves a context-aware visual policy network, which is a deep learning model that learns to attend to different regions of the image over time. This involves optimizing the model using an actor-critic policy gradient method, which falls under the category of reinforcement learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses related work in the areas of image captioning and visual attention, which are relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
